spells.name: Air Walk
spells.description: Subject treads on air as if solid (climb or descend at 45-degree angle).

spells.name: Blight
spells.description: Withers one plant or deals 1d6/level damage to plant creature.

spells.name: Command Plants
spells.description: Sways the actions of plant creatures.

spells.name: Control Water
spells.description: Raises or lowers bodies of water.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.description: Cancels one magical spell or effect.

spells.name: Flame Strike
spells.description: Smites foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).

spells.name: Freedom of Movement
spells.description: Subject moves normally despite impediments to movement.

spells.name: Giant Vermin
spells.description: Turns centipedes, scorpions, or spiders into giant vermin.

spells.name: Ice Storm
spells.description: Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.

spells.name: Reincarnate
spells.description: Brings dead subject back in a random body.

spells.name: Repel Vermin
spells.description: Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.

spells.name: Rusting Grasp
spells.description: Your touch corrodes iron and alloys.

spells.name: Scrying
spells.description: Spies on subject from a distance.

spells.name: Spike Stones
spells.description: Creatures in area take 1d8 damage, may also be slowed.
